name: mikroe.click.bm78
short_description: BM78 Click is a compact add-on board designed to integrate dual-mode Bluetooth wireless capability into various projects. This board features the BM78, a fully certified 2.4GHz Bluetooth (BR/EDR/LE) wireless module from Microchip. The BM78 module includes an on-board Bluetooth stack, power management subsystem, 2.4GHz transceiver, and RF power amplifier. It supports GAP, SDP, SPP, and GATT profiles, with data transfer facilitated through transparent UART mode. It features a MODE SEL switch for operational modes, a reset pin, status indicators, a software power button, and a WAKE button.
